Module atlantafx.base
Package atlantafx.base.controls

Class PasswordTextField

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.control.Control
javafx.scene.control.TextInputControl
javafx.scene.control.TextField
atlantafx.base.controls.CustomTextField
atlantafx.base.controls.PasswordTextField
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, javafx.scene.control.Skinnable
public class PasswordTextField extends CustomTextField
A convenience wrapper for instantiating a CustomTextField with a PasswordTextFormatter. For additional info refer to the PasswordTextFormatter documentation.

      text - A string for text content.
      bullet - A bullet character to mask the password string.
